name: Rolling Machine
description:
Roll at full speed without crashing!

In Rolling Machine, you are getting your own vehicle. Tilt your device and move it through a course full of obstacles. Beware of hitting the top. It could break.

Features:

  • Infinite and random levels, with many obstacles.
  • Make the highest score and compete against players around the world.
  • Customize all the parts of your vehicle.
  • Complete a huge variety of missions.
  • Discover secret areas with minigames.
